scripts.start:server: cd server && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.build: echo "Build script ignored! Heroku will use this and we want to have full control"
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.dev:client: cd client && npm run dev && cd ..
scripts.dev:server: cd server && npm run dev && cd ..
scripts.setup: npm run setup:client && npm run setup:server
scripts.setup:client: cd client && npm run setup && cd ..
scripts.setup:server: cd server && npm run setup && cd ..
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run setup && npm run build:client
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.test:client: cd client && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.test:server: cd server && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.code-style-check: npm run code-style-check:client && npm run code-style-check:server
scripts.code-style-check:client: cd client && npm run code-style-check && cd ..
scripts.code-style-check:server: cd server && npm run code-style-check && cd ..
scripts.pre-commit: npm run pre-commit:client && npm run pre-commit:server
scripts.pre-commit:client: cd client && npm run pre-commit && cd ..
scripts.pre-commit:server: cd server && npm run pre-commit && cd ..
scripts.autofix: npm run autofix:client && npm run autofix:server
scripts.autofix:client: cd client && npm run autofix && cd ..
scripts.autofix:server: cd server && npm run autofix && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.lint:client: cd client && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.lint:server: cd server && npm run lint && cd ..
